duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement marketing solutions grounded on achieving measurable business results for our partners
Analyze data and insights to guide strategy and implementation of paid social and SEM solutions
Identify optimization opportunities for improving performance
Guide media and creative strategy, planning, and implementation of campaigns to deliver against KPIs
Requires strong project management skills to prioritize day-to-day standard tasks, test activations, and campaign optimization
Oversee all reporting, measurement strategy, tracking, and results delivery
Build and manage relationships with clients, and become the primary point of contact for all things RealEyes Digital for each client.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree in a technical or marketing field
